name: HouseGarvey
_source: s;Garvey;Heh.{w} Look at this place, all posh and gaudy.{w} Leod's got terrible taste.{w}{clear}Well...{w} had, more like!{w} Hehehe...|So glad that bugger's finally dead.{w}{clear}{c:expression;Garvey;HalfCloseEyes}After what he did to me...{w} bugger deserves so much more than that.|But this...{w} this is good enough.{w}{clear}{c:expression;Garvey;CloseEyes}I still remember the last time I was in here...{w} yes. Vividly...
s;SLeod;Garvey?{w} How unlike you to visit!|What's the occassion?{w} Come to beg?{w}{clear}I'm not offering handouts, especially not to the likes of you.
# Garvey lunges towards Leod and grabs him
s;SGarvey;You wanna tell me what you were up to last night, mister mayor? Huh!?{w}{clear}You wanna fess up!?{w} What the hells were you doing with her, you pig!?
s;SLeod;Y-you!{w} Let me go this instant, or I'll have you executed, you vagabond!

s;SGarvey;That was my wife, Leod.{w} My wife!{w} And she's not the only one, is she?{w}{clear}You think I'm gonna let you get away with it?{w} That I'll keep quiet!?{w}{clear}Because I won't.{w} I'll spill.{w} To the town, to your wife, to everybody!
s;SLeod;Say one more word like that, and you'll be in chains before sunrise!|You think I don't have that power?{w}{clear}This bruise is all it'll take!{w} One word from me, and your life ends!
s;SGarvey;You think I care?{w} My life's already falling apart because of you!{w}{clear}You think you can fool around with my wife without me coming knocking?

s;SLeod;You should learn your place, Garvey.|I am the mayor{semicolon}{w} you, a lowly guard.{w}{clear}It is my right, as protector and leader of this town, to take.{w}{clear}To take all I please from those who I provide so much for.{w} It's simple.{w}{clear}Everyone else has gotten with the program.{w} Everyone except you.{w}{clear} So?{w} What's it going to be, Garvey?|You want your revenge?{w} Or your life?
# He lets go, returning to the other side of the screen

s;SLeod;Now, now, Garvey.{w} I am a benevolent soul.{w} I will spare you. For now.{w}{clear}But this bruise you gave me...{w} it stresses me out.{w} I'll need comfort.{w}{clear}Perhaps that darling wife of yours will offer it to me again tonight.
s;SGarvey;Lay another finger on her, and I'll-!

s;SLeod;Ah ah ah!{w} What did I just tell you?{w}{clear}Besides...{w} you need to be punished somehow.{w} This is the kinder option.{w}{clear}Mhmhmhm...{w} look at you.{w} So angry, but with so little recourse!|I pity you, Garvey.{w} I really do.{w}{clear}I can't imagine how it must feel to be so...{w} insignificant.{w} It's a shame.
s;SGarvey;Keep talking, you fat prick.{w} I'll remember every last word of it.

s;SLeod;Will you now?{w} In that case, allow me to impart a lesson to you, my friend{semicolon}|I am the beating heart of Eislinn.|You, on the other hand, are nothing.|Act against me again, and I will have you killed within the hour.{w}{clear}Serve me dutifully, and I will grant you...{w} a small portion of my riches.{w}{clear}This is the arrangement that all of your peers have lived by for years.{w}{clear}Are you ready to step in line?{w} Or will you attempt to defy me again?
s;SGarvey;...{w} Fine.{w} I'll behave.{w} For now.
s;SLeod;Hmph.{w} Good.{w} You will learn quickly how much simpler life is like this.{w}{clear}Then, you'll wonder why you ever disobeyed in the first place.
s;SGarvey;Maybe.{w} I won't forget this little talk of ours, Leod.{w} I promise.
s;SLeod;Then you may yet be useful to me after all.{w} Now, run along home.|Your wife must miss you dearly.

s;Garvey;Bastard only kept me alive so he could lord over me. The fat pig.|But look where it got him, eh?|And we're all better off without him.{w}{clear}I'll just loot the louse's place now that he's gone.{w}{clear}Not like he's around to tell me no, is he?{w} Heh.

s;Garvey;...{w} Doesn't feel as good as I thought it would, honestly.{w}{clear}Everything he did...{w} it still happened, dead or not.{w} Whatever.{w}{clear}I'll take what I can pry out of his cold, dead hands.{w} It's all I've got.
update_achievement;10;A Crime of Passion;Viewed Garvey's Flashback in Ch4.
